entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Segmentation fault when passing byref parameters to tailcall methods #58531
    6.0.0
  • Inlining dead branch elimination doesn't work on pointers #58527
    6.0.0
  • Dump generation segfaults in DAC and doesn't complete #58525
    6.0.0
  • JIT: Slow spills to stack in a loop on Linux vs Windows #58522
    7.0.0
  • Assertion failed 'varTypeIsStruct(varDsc)' for a simple Unsafe usage #58518
    6.0.0
  • [dotnet-dump] dumpobj fails for a stack object from a coredump #58517
    7.0.0
  • dotnet-dump.dll fails if executed by corerun #58515
  • Assertion failed 'tmp == genReturnLocal' in 'TestClass:VarArg(int,System.TypedReference):long:this' during 'Importation' (IL size 70) #58505
    7.0.0
  • macOS localpath ucschars are still escaped #58504
  • System.Text.Json code gen: Could not load file or assembly 'Microsoft.CodeAnalysis, Version=4.0.0.0 #58502
  • [CoreCLR] Test failure HostActivation.Tests_net6.0_x86 #58501
  • Inbox assets which ship as part of packages aren't crossgend #58500
    6.0.0
  • [HTTP/2] Send RST_STREAM instead EOF if request has Content-Length, but body is not sent #58498
  • System.Drawing Image.Save(Stream stream, ImageFormat format) produces different results in linux and windows #58496
    Future
  • Simplify .NETFramework tfms by avoiding the "-windows" RID #58495
  • Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection 5.0.2 versioning #58494
    Future
  • System.Diagnostics.Process long paths issues #58492
    7.0.0
  • With RC1 SDK zip/tar.bar installed, maui workload install failed in CLI. #58490
  • stelem.ref type check should take the static type of the array into account #58487
    7.0.0
  • .NET 6: System.Random - seeded implementation of .NextInt64* methods is inconsistent with .Next* methods #58486
  • [API Proposal]: Add data log rolling support with the specific size #58483
    7.0.0
  • Test failed file_io.GetFileSize.test1 #58481
    7.0.0

Closed

  • TypeInfo.GetDeclaredMethods() / GetDeclaredABC() methods behavior inconsistent with the documentation on it #56131
    7.0.0
  • Should not `IAsyncEnumerable` inherit from (implement) `IEnumerable`? #58476
  • [API Proposal]: Quaternion.Zero is missing #57253
    7.0.0
  • Mono: handle structs larger than 256 bytes correctly #58190
    6.0.0
  • Test failure ThreadPoolBoundHandleTests.MultipleOperationsOverSingleHandle_CompletedWorkItemCountTest #58151
  • JIT: [QualityWeek] assertion failure with random edge counts on bytemark #58375
    7.0.0
  • iOS: building with LLVM causes some exception catch clauses to not work #56100
    6.0.0
  • [ios][mono][JIT] Are there any plan to allow dotnet full support / JIT / non-AOT on ios? #58115
    Future
  • Invalid pointer address during network call #55010
    7.0.0
  • QUIC: Add API to allow detecting when peer aborts receive #58229
    6.0.0
  • [net6.0-android] HttpClient.ServerCertificateCustomValidationCallback throws 'Arg_PlatformNotSupported' #57537
    6.0.0
  • There are missing and mismatching cultures between .net and the os #58200
  • Failures in System.Numerics.Tests.Vector3Tests.Vector3DistanceTest on Windows #49824
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Equivalent to ICLRStrongName::StrongNameSignatureVerificationEx from .NET Framework #56976
    Future
  • Test failure: SendAsync_MultipleOutstandingSendOperations_Throws #58354
    7.0.0
  • Test failure System.Net.Sockets.Tests.DualModeConnectionlessReceiveMessageFrom.ReceiveMessageFromAsyncV4BoundToSpecificV4_Success #58482
    7.0.0
  • [libraries][Android] System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates No IndexOutOfRangeException thrown #58416
    6.0.0
  • dotnet paket restore crashes on macos : Failed to initialize CoreCLR, HRESULT: 0x80004005 #58473
  • High memory usage with c# dynamic keyword in Windows Service #27537
    6.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Convert the check for stdatomic.h into a compile step as opposed to existence check #58532
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, auto-merge, 7.0.0
  • Fix dump generation segfault in DAC #58530
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, auto-merge
  • Move the implementation of Win32Exception into System.Private.CoreLib #58529
    area-Microsoft.Win32, 7.0.0
  • Clean up tests under CoreMangLib/system/runtime/interopservices/safehandle #58528
    area-Interop-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • LoggerMessage formatter performance improvements #58524
    area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution
  • [mono] win32 implementation of g_get_current_dir #58523
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [mini] Don't add unbox tramopline on generic DIM calls #58521
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Add support for build.cmd -vs corehost.sln #58520
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [libraries] Restrict ILLink Suppression xml to mobile platforms #58519
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0-rc1' => 'release/6.0' #58516
  • DO NOT MERGE: Macos builds on perf measure pool #58514
  • Delete shutdown special handling in a few CoreCLR PAL methods #58513
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • Turn off release branch in perf-slow.yml for release/6.0 #58512
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Conditionally build tests, using the conds on which we submit tests to Helix #58511
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • JIT: fix some issues in fgIsThrowHlpBlk #58510
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Add System.Net.Http ServerCertificateCustomValidationCallback ILLink Suppression #58508
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Add support for non-seekable files to RandomAccess #58506
    area-System.IO
  • [release/6.0] [MonoVM] Fix calculation of code size for AOT assemblies mixing JIT and LLVM #58503
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Fix a few incorrect .NETFramework target frameworks #58499
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [Main] Don't always build source build with ci flag #58497
  • Change compile time dependency of ICU API ucol_setMaxVariable to be runtime instead. #58485
    area-System.Globalization
  • Use new Hosted build pools #58484
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Reflection nullability API: improve test coverage #58479
    area-System.Reflection, 6.0.0

Merged

  • Add `Zero` property to `Quaternion`. #58406
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Update CompatibilitySuppressions after updating APICompat that uses references #58208
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, auto-merge
  • Delete unused loader test libraries #58488
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • Use temporary ni.dll.tmp files with crossgen2 pipeline mode in order to not interfere with crossgen2 itself #57341
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [main] Conditionally build allconfigurations (#58122) #58493
  • Add RemoteInvokeOptions to EtwManifestGeneration test #58478
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, test enhancement, auto-merge, 6.0.0
  • Add & publish a cm.1 file for each .rpm we ship #58465
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • [release/6.0] Bring back System.Security.AccessControl package #57816
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, regression-from-last-release
  • Initial document for JIT and GC stress usage #58147
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, Future
  • JIT: Fix preheader weight computation #58454
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • fix stable pkg proj versioning support #58474
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [MonoVM] Fix calculation of code size for AOT assemblies mixing JIT and LLVM #58491
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0-rc1] [debugger] Avoid calling debugger_agent_single_step_from_context when thread is not attached yet #58480
    Servicing-approved, area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Add System.Net.Http ServerCertificateCustomValidationCallback ILLink Suppression #58456
    area-System.Net, 6.0.0
  • [release/6.0] [QUIC] Add QuicStream.WaitForWriteCompletionAsync #58415
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation, 6.0.0
  • In reset_memory, check settings.entry_memory_load ... #58350
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Fix X509ChainElementCollection_CopyTo_NonZeroLowerBound_ThrowsIndexOutOfRangeException test on Android #58489
    area-System.Security
  • [debugger] Avoid calling debugger_agent_single_step_from_context when thread is not attached yet #58467
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Re-enable Vector3DistanceTest #57077
    area-System.Numerics
  • Don't always build source build with ci flag #58457
    area-Infrastructure
  • [release/6.0] Remove usage of [AggressiveOptimization] #58253
    area-System.Text.Json
  • [release/6.0] [mini] Dynamically allocate a buffer for large runtime invoke results #58364
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Delete `TruncateOrSignExtend32` #56904
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Fix X509ChainElementCollection_CopyTo_NonZeroLowerBound_ThrowsIndexOutOfRangeException test on Android #58441
    area-System.Security

Updated

  • [libraries] Skip test suites crashing on CI for iOS/tvOS/MacCatalyst #57208
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, os-maccatalyst
  • Rev Alpine WithNode from 3.9 to 3.14 #57324
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution, 6.0.0
  • [Group 1] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyModel` #57445
    area-DependencyModel, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Implement NativeLibrary.GetEntryPointModuleHandle #57610
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • [.NET 5.0] Notify Reference Tracker runtime of disconnect at the right time #58412
    Servicing-consider, area-Interop-coreclr, 5.0.x
  • File.*AllText* optimizations #58167
    area-System.IO, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • Refactor symmetric one-shots for improved performance #58270
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Optimize FMA codegen base on the overwritten #58196
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Rename NGenHashTable to DacEnumerableHashTable to describe its unique feature and remove dead code #58080
    area-VM-coreclr, auto-merge
  • Universal arm crossgen compiler #58279
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Change hosted pool #57785
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Implement support for passing a .env file to corerun to easily set environment variables for stress testing. #58222
    area-Host
  • Update native COM server tests to execute directly instead of using the Exe launcher program. #58302
    test enhancement, area-Interop-coreclr, auto-merge
  • More cleanups in Assembly/Loader/Binder area #58462
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • [Group 1] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.FileSystemGlobbing` #57398
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-FileSystem, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Run minimal set of iOS / tvOS device tests #58444
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Increase some of the DnsEndPointTest timeouts #58129
    area-System.Net.Sockets, 7.0.0
  • [DRAFT][wasm] WebSocket improve send buffers #58199
    arch-wasm, area-System.Net
  • Request fewer threads in the thread pool #57885
    area-System.Threading, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] Add support for native relinking after Build, and AOT after publish #57556
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Pass a null getter\setter with [JsonIgnore] and src gen #58405
    area-System.Text.Json, 6.0.0
  • [wasm] Support aot without trimming #58306
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Support JsonConverterFactory with src-gen #58398
    area-System.Text.Json, 6.0.0
  • Search native code in all R2R ni.dll in version bubble #57277
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • stress test sandboxing #57653
    * NO MERGE *, NO REVIEW
  • Support duplicated type names with src gen #58448
    area-System.Text.Json, 6.0.0
  • [mono] Revive FullAOT test lanes #55362
    area-Infrastructure-mono, runtime-mono
  • Fix Console.Write on iOS #56713
    area-System.Console, os-ios, 6.0.0
  • Allow folding of `LONG` nodes with field sequences #57605
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Use ref local in `MulticastDelegate.TrySetSlot` #56842
    area-System.Runtime, needs more info, community-contribution
  • Process.WaitForExit: don't wait for standard streams when process was killed. #48101
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, community-contribution, Future
  • Remove `Microsoft.IO.Redist`. #58359
    * NO MERGE *, area-System.IO, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Reenable a few OperatingSystem tests on MacCatalyst #58428
  • [release/6.0] [HTTP/3] Fix content stream read hang #58460
    area-System.Net.Http, 6.0.0
  • Add documentation to System.Net #57855
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • Run runtime tests marked as JitOptimizationSensitive on Mono. #58106
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Make bashing to constants nicer #58171
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove dead code #58475
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix zero initialization use of "initReg" #58410
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add internal AppExecLink support to link APIs #58233
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • Delete redundant AssemblyName test #58477
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • Support unseekable filestream when ReadAllBytes[Async] #58434
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Follow up on Scatter/Gather API changes #58447
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Set generic type arguments nullability for value types #58390
    area-System.Reflection
